hero.title: DIGITAL MARKETING AGENCY
hero.descriptionBefore: Unlock your brand’s full potential with Interacti Marketing Agency — a digital marketing agency delivering strategic solutions that drive real results. We offer expert services in
hero.descriptionAfter: — empowering businesses to grow smarter across every digital touchpoint.

about.partnersSubtitle: Proud partners of innovative companies across industries
about.heading: Why Choose Interacti Marketing Agency as Your Digital Partner?
about.intro: At Interacti Marketing Agency, we empower ambitious brands with high-impact digital strategies designed for growth.
about.descriptionBefore: From strategy to execution, our agency delivers results-driven solutions across seven core areas:
about.descriptionAfter: We don't just follow trends — we shape them. Our expert team helps businesses like yours scale faster, connect deeper, and thrive in a digital-first world.

cards.title: SEO Et Analyses
cards.text: We improve your online visibility through data-driven SEO strategies. From keyword research to technical audits and content optimization, we help your brand rank higher and convert better across search engines.

cards.title: Creative Design
cards.text: We craft powerful brand identities and visual experiences through branding, UI/UX, graphic design, and motion design — turning your message into memorable visuals.

cards.title: Digital Marketing
cards.text: We develop and execute integrated digital strategies across SEO, paid ads, social media, and marketing automation — focused on lead generation, engagement, and growth.

cards.title: Web Design & Development
cards.text: We design and develop fast, secure, and conversion-focused websites that elevate your brand. Whether you're launching a new site or revamping an old one, our team ensures seamless UX, custom UI, mobile responsiveness, and full SEO readiness. Get a digital presence that performs.

seoSection.subheading: Your visibility is your competitive edge.
seoSection.heading: SEO Excellence Services by Interacti Marketing Agency
seoSection.description: Boost your online presence with a complete, customized SEO strategy. From technical audits and keyword planning to content optimization and backlink building — we ensure your site ranks, converts, and grows. Stop wasting time on manual tasks. Let us optimize your SEO and automate your digital growth with measurable impact.

processSection.subtitle: Work Process
processSection.title: Our Work Process
processSection.intro: We turn your ideas into measurable outcomes with a clear, client-centric approach.

steps.title: Choose a Service
steps.desc: Pick the service that best fits your needs—from marketing and branding to design and web development.

steps.title: Define Your Requirements
steps.desc: Share your goals, timeline, and expectations so we can build a custom solution tailored to your vision.

steps.title: Book a Meeting
steps.desc: We schedule a discovery session (online or in-person) to confirm details and align on execution.

steps.title: Final Solution Delivery
steps.desc: You receive a fully executed, ready-to-launch solution—on time, on point, and supported every step of the way.

projects.title: Search Engine Optimization
projects.description: Improved SEO and online visibility to increase organic traffic.

projects.title: App web responsive

projects.title: Audit and optimisation technique
projects.description: Analyse complète and optimisation technique pour améliorer les performances SEO.
projects.alt: SEO audit report with performance metrics

testimonials.text: I am thrilled with the website Interacti Marketing Agency developed for my business! Their team understood our vision perfectly and created a stunning, user-friendly site that exceeded our expectations. The process was seamless, and the final product has significantly boosted our online presence. Highly recommend their web development services!
testimonials.author: Haitham
